name: Frutiger Aero
description: The classic early-2000s aesthetic defined by glossy blues, glass bubbles, and organic-meets-digital harmony. This is one of my most favorite aesthetics in the frutiger genre.

name: Frutiger Eco
description: A nature-driven offshoot with green leaves, water droplets, and a focus on sustainability and serenity. Similar to frutiger aero, it is one of my most favorite aesthetics.

name: Frutiger Metro
description: A sleeker, urban evolution of the Aero look—vibrant colors meet minimal geometry and streamlined UI forms.

name: Frutiger Aero Cybercore
description: Futuristic and high-tech: glass UI fused with holographic light, data streams, and glowing interfaces.

name: Dark Aero
description: A moody, neon-blue reinterpretation of Frutiger Aero with dark gradients, metallic tones, and luminescent glow.

name: Frutiger Fruits
description: A playful, candy-colored remix of Aero—juicy tones, glassy reflections, and cheerful 2000s optimism.

name: Dorfic
description: A minimal, Scandinavian-inspired visual language blending early web skeuomorphism with modern simplicity. Unfortunately, it is not among my most favored aesthetics, but I still value it nonetheless!

name: Technozen
description: Balances futuristic tech motifs with zen-like calm—soft lighting, gradients, and tranquil digital balance.

name: Cyber Glacier
description: Cool blue-white gradients, ice-like translucency, and subtle light flares evoke a digital frozen world. This is up there with Frutiger Aero and Frutiger Eco as one of my most favorite aesthetics.

name: Aero Futurism
description: A forward-looking evolution of Aero—sleek, utopian, and infused with light, glass, and ambient motion.
